item.title: Arcane Archer Rework
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: Of the Fighter subclasses, the Arcane Archer might have one of the most defined themes: the archer with an arsenal of magical ‘trick’ arrows at their disposal. However, due to the subclass’s mechanical execution in D&D 5e, I have almost never seen or heard of anyone actually using it. In this article, I’ll be breaking down why it is so mechanically lackluster, and then creating a homebrew version that should be able to (be equivalent to other fighter subclasses).
